Module com.example.project3fx
Package com.example.project3fx

Class Student

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3fx.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Student>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonResident, Resident
public abstract class Student extends Object implements Comparable<Student>
This class has the students profile, major and number of credits completed This class has the comparable interface so that the students can be sorted and compared by last and first name also their date of birth and by their major and credits completed.
Author:
harsh_patel and giancarlo_Andretta

    • Student

      public Student()

    • Student

      public Student(String fname, String lname, Date dob, Major major, int creditCompleted)
      Constructor for the student class
      Parameters:
      lname - the last name of the student
      fname - the first name of the student
      dob - the date of birth of the student
      major - the major of the student
      creditCompleted - the number of credits completed by the student this code will create a new profile object using these parameters and assign it to the profile and assigns major and credit completed to the correct part in the student class

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this student object to the specified object. The result is `true` if and only if the argument is not `null` and is a `Student` object that has the same profile, creditCompleted, and major as this object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare this student against.
      Returns:
      `true` if the given object represents a `Student` equivalent to this student, `false` otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the student. The string representation consists of the profile, major, credit completed and the standing of the student.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the student.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Student o)
      Compares two students based on their profile, major, and credit completed. The comparison first considers the profile, then the major, and finally the credit completed.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Student>
      Parameters:
      o - the other student to compare to.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this student is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified student.
